Part of supersonic parachute deployment video of #Tianwen1 #Zhurong rover landing on Mars. The Mars atmosphere is only about 1% as dense as earth‚Äôs, thus the parachute has to be deployed when the speed is still as high as Mach 2 (2 times the speed of sound). Credit: CNSA  https://t.co/eUJGmyIQTD
